entities.description: Misuse of Tramadol products in the past year.
Misuse of Codeine products in the past year.
Misuse of Morphine products in the past year.
Misuse of Buprenorphine products in the past year.
Misuse of Oxymorphone products in the past year.
Any prescription pain reliever included in the survey.

relationships.description: Indicates if the respondent misused Tramadol products in the past year.
Indicates if the respondent misused Codeine products in the past year.
Indicates if the respondent misused Morphine products in the past year.
Indicates if the respondent misused Buprenorphine products in the past year.
Indicates if the respondent misused Oxymorphone products in the past year.
Classifies Tramadol misuse as a type of prescription pain reliever misuse.
Classifies Codeine misuse as a type of prescription pain reliever misuse.
Classifies Morphine misuse as a type of prescription pain reliever misuse.
Classifies Buprenorphine misuse as a type of prescription pain reliever misuse.
Classifies Oxymorphone misuse as a type of prescription pain reliever misuse.
